title: A letter from the king, to his court of Parliament of Burdeaux, touching the death of the duke of Guyse At Burdeaux by S. Milanges, ordinary printer vnto the king. 1589. By commaundement of the said court. Newly translated according to the French coppie.
author: France. Sovereign (1574-1589 : Henry III)
publisher: Printed [by T. Orwin] for Thomas Woodcocke, dwelling in Pauls Church yard at the signe of the Black Beare,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
